QuestData.Title: Break It Down
QuestData.Description: I've seen the ritual. It's... terrifying.$b$bBut the altars seem to be the key. If only I had my pyrotechnic powder, I could blast them to bits!$b$b<Primrose is silent for a moment, then takes a deep breath.>$b$bIf you could get the powder and guard me, we could blow up those altars.$b$bI stashed as much as I could in our dwellings. They don't seem to care any more.$b$bYou don't have wings, but a pinch of faerie dust should work for a short time.$b$bLet's do this before I change my mind!
QuestData.LogDescription: Use Primrose's Pyrotechnic Powder to destroy $1oa Ritual Altars.
QuestData.RewardText: We did it! All the altars are destroyed!
